name: Nutbuster (Chal🆖)
description:
📀\\\---WELCOME TO NUTBUSTAAAAAA!!!!!---///📀

 

welcome to a game made for kids (not really), and you are tasked to BUST SOME NUTS, and i mean that by literally

 

📃\\\---THE GENERIC ASS STORY---///📃

 

Once upon a various seasonal scenario, Two young college dropouts named Baa and Gaa, Were having a nice little walk in the park, When suddenly, A group, No, A horde of large and tall men that have they're pubes coming out of their pants for some reason, Confront them, And stole Gaa out of pure spite because of they're perfect relationship, So Baa in pure rage and hatred and literally anything that describes a mad person, Went out and fuck em guys up by kicking they're nuts straight up, Oh and he also got an extremely durable leg out of nowhere so uhh yeah lol

 

⌨️///---THE UHH CONTROLS---///⌨️  
  • Press [Z] to enter
  • Press [X] to skip dialogue
  • Press [ESC] to go back/ use menu
  • Press [C] to use menu
  • Press [R] to reset

 

📃///---UNNESSECARY BUT ACTUALLY NESSECARRY INFO---///📃

 

This game is pretty much in it's infancy and i will not develop it any further due to uhh... burn out, if you did like my game and would like to see more of it then uhm.... maybe i'll update it soon
